company: The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology
description:
Job Title:          Works Supervisor (Sports Facilities)
Department:     Dean of Students' Office
Job ID:              7054

Job Posting Details

The University is now looking for a high caliber candidate to join our Sports Development: Facilities Management Team in Dean of Students’ Office.  

The appointee will participate in the daily operation and maintenance of the University’s sports facilities including but not limited to Indoor Sports Center, Athletics Field and Track, Swimming Pool, Tennis Court, Water Sports Center, etc. to ensure they are operated and maintained in a safe and efficient manner.

The appointee is expected to perform the following duties:



Supervise attendants, lifeguard and staff of contractors;
Liaise and coordinate with various offices and contractors for maintenance works, daily operation, improvement and upgrading works;
Handle requisition and stock taking of equipment;
Handle users’ enquiries on site; and
Perform shift duty and attend emergency duties.
Applicants should have a diploma or above plus at least 3 years of relevant work experience.  A good command of both spoken and written English and Chinese (including Putonghua) is essential.  The ideal candidate should also have the ability to work independently.  Holder of a valid beach lifeguard award is an advantage.  The appointee is required to work on weekends and public holidays.  Applicants with lower academic qualification but with extensive relevant work experience will also be considered. (Duration: 2 years, renewable)

Starting salary will be commensurate with qualifications and experience.  Fringe benefits including annual leave, medical and dental benefits will be provided.  A gratuity will be payable upon successful completion of contract. 

Application Procedure
In support of a green work environment, we accept applications submitted online only.  To apply, please complete an online application form through the HKUST Careers website (https://hkustcareers.ust.hk) and return them online to the Human Resources Office.  Review of applications will begin on Wednesday, 2 February 2022 and will continue until the position is filled.  Applicants will receive an acknowledgement by email upon successful submission.  We thank applicants for their interest, but advise that only shortlisted candidates will be notified of the result of the application.

(Information provided by applicants will be used for recruitment and other employment-related purposes only.)

HKUST is an equal opportunities employer and is committed to our core values of
inclusiveness, diversity, and respect.

Handle requisition and stock taking of equipment

description:
Tutor in the School of Public Health (Ref.: 509133) (to commence as soon as possible, on a two-year fixed-term basis with contract-end gratuity and University contribution to a retirement benefits scheme, totalling up to 10% of basic salary, and with the possibility of renewal subject to satisfactory performance)

Applicants should possess a doctoral degree by research, OR a Master’s degree plus at least three years’ teaching experience in tertiary institutions, in exercise science or a related discipline. High proficiency in English, enthusiasm in teaching, and good mentoring skills are essential. Applicants should demonstrate a strong commitment to and evidence of excellence in teaching at the undergraduate and/or postgraduate level. The appointee will teach courses in exercise physiology, exercise prescription, sports nutrition, health benefits of exercise, exercise and diseases, biomechanics, physical activity measurement, exercise biology, and other related fields. He/She will provide support to curriculum development, enhancement and quality assurance; research and scholarship in medical education; development of academic partnerships; and perform other duties as assigned. Our Catering Department manages one of the largest and most diverse catering operations in Hong Kong. Hands-on experience in MS Office applications.

策劃及參與不同類型的市場推廣活動
協助僱主開立強積金帳戶，並整合個人資產至宏利
配合政府政策，安排退休方案 (退稅年金丶可扣稅自願性供款及自願醫保)
提供適合企業及個人之「保費融資方案」
一般保險及團體醫療方案
基金投資規劃及管理
對象要求 :
中五畢業、香港中學⽂憑（中 / 英及數學五科及格）或持同等學歷以上
1年或以上工作經驗，具客戶服務或銷售工作經驗更佳
成熟穩重、性格開朗、積極進取、⾃律及良好溝通技巧
有責任感，對生活有要求和期望
喜歡學習新事物，每天發放正能量
彈性上班時間 ，歡迎 空中服務員 / 旅遊業從業員 / 全職媽媽  加入
我們的優勢：

 為客戶提供最專業丶最合適的分析服務, 與客戶保持長遠而又持久的關係，將一切機會化成「商機」，時代不斷轉變，要迎合市場需要，就要及早掌握⾏業商機 !
宏利是全港最令客戶滿意的保險品牌之一，強積金市場佔有率排行NO.1
疫情漸趨穩定，新成⽴的公司將會陸續出現，僱主必須為員⼯設⽴強積⾦計劃及購買勞⼯保險 (法例規定)
醫療通脹驚⼈，積蓄易被蒸發，疫情下危疾及住院保險更令⼈關注
可退稅年⾦、可扣稅自願性供款及⾃願醫保購買熱潮升溫，切身的理財檢視服務需求⼤增。
⾹港蟬聯全球最⻑壽地區，⾯對漫⻑的退休⽣活，退休規劃才是應對⻑壽⾵險的解決方法。

以上種種都為理財策劃⾏業帶來無限商機，誠邀閣下加⼊我們團隊，共同創富!

⽴即申請 “Apply now”  將履歷電郵給我們，踏出成功的第⼀步!

description:

構思和組織遊戲室的新活動及節慶活動。
負責遊戲室的現金處理。
為企業賓客舉辦特別活動(如生日派對)和團隊建立活動。
於酒店康樂區域進行清潔工作(如泳池傢具、遊戲設備等)。
處理行政職務包括準備酒店賓客的酒店指南、康樂設施的數據輸入、活動建議、獲指派的工作進度報告和採購團隊的運作物料等。
執行獲分配的其他職務(例如儲物室運作、確保順利的設備採購、遊戲室運作物料採購等)。
基本條件:
溝通技巧 - 確保工作時與同事和上司的有效性和效率。
語言能力：廣東話，英語，普通話 - 能與外國及中國內地的客人溝通。

持有急救和去顫法證書 – 為有需要為賓客提供急救治療。

job_title: Personal Trainer -  Pilates & Gyrotonic (Happy Valley Clubhouse)
description:
The Department
Our Catering Department manages one of the largest and most diverse catering operations in Hong Kong.  We provide a wide range of catering, sports and recreation facilities for Members and their guests in three Clubhouses.  In addition, both Happy Valley and Sha Tin Racecourses have numerous catering facilities used by Members, non-members and corporate organisations for a variety of functions.

The Job
You will:
Identify the goals of Members and guests who are interested in our fitness programmes; provide personal evaluation on their fitness level by reviewing their abilities, physical conditions and overall health to ensure that the fitness plans are suitable
Develop personalized training programme by operating pilates and gyrotonic for clients to reach their fitness and health goals
Teach and demonstrate the proper techniques for all exercises in the fitness plans; ensure that equipment is used properly to minimize the risk of injury.
Observe and communicate with the clients clearly on their progress; motivate and encourage clients
Explain and enforce all health and safety rules and regulations
Provide excellent customer services according to the Club’s standards; address clients’ questions and complaints promptly in a professional manner.
Administer emergency first aid
Prepare the monthly PT classes summary highlighting the performance and operational issues and prepare other reports and proposals as required; ensure the achievement of the PT classes KPIs including but is not limited to attaining clients’ satisfaction ratings and PT service revenues.Perform any other related duties as and when assigned by supervisor.
About You
You should have:

Certified personal trainer possessing ACSM, AFAA, NASM, ISSA or ACE
Reformer Pilates Certificate is highly preferred
Valid CPR and AED
A qualification in Gyrontonic in conjunction with Pilates apparatus would be advantageous;
At least 5 years’ relevant experience
Sound knowledge of personal fitness training
Fluency in both written and spoken English
Fluency in Cantonese is preferred, and knowledge of Mandarin is an advantage
Terms of Employment
The level of appointment will be commensurate with qualifications and experience.
How to Apply
Please send your resume, complete with expected salary and job reference by clicking the Apply Now button or to: 
Fax: 2966-7002
Mail: The Human Resources Department, The Hong Kong Jockey Club, 1 Sports Road, Happy Valley, Hong Kong
We are an equal opportunity employer. Personal data provided by job applicants will be used strictly in accordance with the Club's notice to employees and prospective employees relating to the Personal Data (Privacy) Ordinance. A copy of which will be provided immediately upon request.

Wealth Management Manager 財富管理經理 精英招募
description:
Job Highlights

一份讓你可終身的事業，實踐置業夢想，財務自由。
由超過20年經驗的好師傅直接貼身教導，助你由無到有。
每月津貼+ 豐厚佣金 + 年終獎金及花紅 + 免費海外會議。

Job Description

你現在所做的是一份工作還是一份事業？究竟是公司需要你還是你需要公司？對於很多人來講工作是不情願做的，但事業卻是你一手建立的，今時今日傳統觀念中你認為安穩的工作是否再安穩？與其等宰割，不如立即起動，人生最後悔的事不是你曾做過的事，而是你想過而沒有做的事！

在職場上一個好的發展平台，跟對了師傅能令一個平凡但有志氣的人出類拔萃，而我會將我豐富的實戰經驗及技巧傾囊相授，為了令你快速的站穩陣腳，成為客戶心目中專業的財富管理精英。實現財務自由，自主人生。

如果你具備以下成功的條件:

真誠

 待人坦誠，才能獲得客戶及朋友的信任。真誠能夠廣結善緣，有誠信的人才能走得更遠。

開心及正面心態

 縱然每個人的成長及發展不同，可是最重要的還是抱持開放的心態，永遠不排斥任何可能性。不放棄想像空間與發展的彈性。

DSE(會考英文及數學合格)或以上學歷 

 團隊選擇走專業路綫，友邦精英學院免費提供一系列領袖培訓課程，再加上好師傅私人教授實戰經驗。讓你快速發展，做一個讓客戶信賴的財富管家。

有工作經驗，優先考慮

 工作學習到與人相處，獨立處事，建立了自己的專業形象，累積了人脈。踏足社會越長，人就越明白打工就像用時間換取金錢。如你不安於現狀，便有更大動力在這裡發展至成功。

福利

每月津貼
豐厚佣金
年終獎金及花紅
AIA全額贊助的海外會議包括機票與酒店
快速晋升機會（最快可一年晋升至管理團隊階層）
團隊旅行及個人業績達標獎勵

   成功取錄者可獲得:

推薦加入友邦精英學院。

Direct Leader 貼身教導及定期REVIEW, 令你起步更容易掌握。
定期舉辦分享會，邀請各界(行內及行外)精英分享成功心得。
每年有多項活動給你及客戶參與，除了可以學習工作以外的知識及技能外，還可透過活動增加接觸和了解客戶的機會。

如您對此工作有興趣或任何疑問，請馬上點按 APPLY NOW 的按鈕, WhatsApp 91934174或於工作時間內致電21229606聯絡秘書GIGI CHOW查詢詳情。

description:

THE JOB

Reporting to the Fencing Coach under the oversight of the Head Fencing Coach,the Assistant Fencing Coach will be responsible for the following duties:

To provide training for elite and junior athletes;
To fully utilize and integrate scientific, medical and other athlete support services into the elite training programme to enhance elite training outcomes;
To assist with the administration and coordination of logistics, accounting, coaching and team resources related to local and overseas squad training and competitions; 
To assist the HKSIL and Hong Kong Fencing Association with coach education programmes; and
To perform any other appropriate duties as assigned by supervisor.

THE REQUIREMENTS

University degree or post-secondary Certificate / Diploma in sports-related fields, or its equivalent;
Holder of a valid coaching certificate issued by relevant governing body;
A minimum of 2 years’ professional coaching experience;
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills;
High level of computer literacy; and
Awareness/ knowledge of Child Protection in sport and equal opportunity issues in the context of Hong Kong are an added advantage.

job_title: Senior Sports & Recreation Coordinator / Sports & Recreation Coordinator
description:
Founded in 2014, Prenetics is a major global diagnostics and genetic testing company with the mission to bring health closer to millions of people globally and decentralize healthcare by making the three pillars — Prevention, Diagnostics and Personalized Care — comprehensive and accessible to anyone, at anytime and anywhere. Prenetics is led by visionary entrepreneur, Danny Yeung, with a team of over 800 employees and operations across 9 locations, including United Kingdom, Hong Kong, India, South Africa, and Southeast Asia. Prenetics develops consumer genetic testing and early colorectal cancer screening; provides COVID-19 testing, rapid point of care and at-home diagnostic testing and medical genetic testing.

Most recently, Prenetics made international headlines to become the first Unicorn in Hong Kong to publicly list on the Nasdaq via merger with 2021 Adrian Cheng's Artisan Acquisition Corp, valuing Prenetics at approximately US $1.7b.

We are looking for individuals with previous health coaching, life coaching, or weight loss coaching experience, but most importantly, we're looking for all-around tech savvy, intelligent, empathetic, and efficient people who have a commitment to helping Prenetics advance and deliver the digital health coaching craft. A professional health background is not required but an advantage.

Responsibilities

Use an individual’s DNA profile to analyse his/her nutritional and lifestyle needs, and develop personalised and sustainable diet, exercise, or other wellness plans tailored to their goals.
Empower clients to take their health into their own hands by helping them understand their current health status, their motivations and ultimately create behavioural change.
Provide remote digital health coaching using science-based therapeutic tools, including an evolving digital app as your main source of communication (includes texting and phone calls).
Empathize, connect, and partner with customers to ensure personal success and sustainability using various counseling techniques including, but not limited to motivational interviewing and customer-centered goal setting.
Collaborate with and support Marketing and Business Development Teams in content creation and Health Team representation.
Design and deliver seminars, workshops, presentations with potential customers and client partners.
Present work progress at regular team meetings.
Participate in offline marketing events, with some of these events to be held on weekends.
Uphold company values and maintain a strong team dynamic including sharing your specific expertise with your teammates.

Our ideal candidate will have


Bachelor’s degree in Public Health, Nutrition, Nutrition & Dietetics is preferred, 1-3 year experience
Very strong communication skills, both written and verbal, in both professional and casual forms in English and in Cantonese. Mandarin will be a plus.
Strong presentation skills and presence
Fast learner and able to adapt to a constantly changing startup environment
Demonstrated prior experience helping others lose weight, eat better or get active
Preferred experience in telephonic health coaching or related role
Strong organizational and time management skills
Highly collaborative and able to work in a team environment
Professional license or certification will be an advantage: dietitians, nutritionists, nurses, therapists, social workers, trainers, health coaches, etc

Our DNA is P-R-E-N-E-T-I-C-S. See what each word of our company name means:

Passion

You love what you do and accomplish amazing result
You spread positivity, bring enthusiasm to work and inspire team members
You drive team toward specific goals, even when they seem unlikely or difficult

Resilience

You embrace changes and be able to drive through uncertainty, ambiguity and uncomfortable situations
You bounce back quickly from setbacks and challenges
You are persistent and determined to achieve the desired outcome

Empowerment

You trust others to play their positions well like an elite sports team
You foster a strong team spirit while encouraging others to take initiatives and risks
You create a space to allow team to grow and hold each other accountable

iNtegrity

You are trustworthy and lead by example
You are consistent in your message and action all the times
You deliver what you have promised

Epic

You challenge your own comfort zone and always outperform yourself
You make meaningful and amazing impact to the world
You dare to take risks and you move fast

Transparency

You are completely honest and committed to giving candid feedbacks, no matter how challenging it might be
You share ideas, knowledge and skills that empower others and create access to information with the wider team
You share wins and failures openly

Ingenuity

You make sound judgement and come up with solutions that are creative and smart. Copy when feasible
You challenge the status quo and question things that could be done differently for better. Modify the wheel if you can’t change it
You think outside of the box and make value-based innovation

Communications

You articulate your thoughts and ideas effectively and respectfully
You know your audience and talk in a way they want to be told
You make sure communications happens, no matter where you are

Selflessness

You put the needs of others before one's own and find ways in helping other to succeed
You focus on team wins than personal wins and share credits
You act in the company's best interest
We are Prenetics, our people make us who we are.

SELF Fitness Studio is seeking a Pilates Instructor



OUR STORY

SELF Fitness Studio is a brand with the only Garuda Pilates equipment in Hong Kong. A boutique studio with in-studio products focused on bespoke private sessions, tailored group classes, conscious movement and mind-body connection. We are situated in the heart of Central. 

OUR MISSION

At SELF, we help our clients understand correct movement patterns through low impact flows and functional training with optimal breathing patterns, and in return clients receive better posture, improved sports performance, less injuries and pain.

If you’re a highly motivated, driven and high performing person who is passionate about changing lives and positively impacting our community, then we cannot wait to share this career opportunity with you.  



THE ROLE

SELF FItness Studio is seeking a Pilates Instructor to join our fun and friendly team. For this position, an ideal instructor will have the following responsibilities.  (Please note: additional responsibilities may be added or presented throughout the course of employment.)

Present an exceptional SELF branded experience to our members and prospects in each class or private session

Create & exceptional workouts/private sessions in the framework of SELF FItness Studio.  

Take courses with The Garuda Method and be teaching it in conjunction with other methodologies

Utilizing our high touch education process, walk clients through their goals and educate them on their ideal package.  

The ideal person will have a genuine curiosity for a Client’s life and be comfortable asking questions about goals, health and wellness and presenting appropriate packages/asking for the sale.  

Adhere to the start and end times, intensity and description of each class/session or format based on the class schedule and varying levels of participants in each class/session.  

Teach classes and/or private sessions on a regular schedule that is introduced monthly and limit subbing.  

When seeking a substitute, always ensure all subs have been contacted by you directly before reaching out to Management for their assistance in finding a substitute.  

Arrive 15 minutes prior to class/session and leave 15 minutes following class/session.  During this time, you will educate clients on the prospective and Introductory Packages and on the studio’s formats and offerings; assist in the booking of additional class times and packages for current clients and engage all clients with our studio’s systems.  

Build attendance and retention of clients through personal social media engagement and announcements and direct client interaction.  

Work directly with Management by communicating feedback, maintenance issues, substitution changes and requests, and scheduling.  

Attend mandatory meetings with Management.  

Qualifications

An ideal candidate will have the following experience and qualifications: 

Instructors must hold at least one Pilates certification in Reformer;additional certifications in other modalities would be preferable.  

Hold 1+ years experience in teaching

Hold and maintain current CPR/AED certifications

Be competent in modifications and contraindications for major injuries of circumstances.  Have a strong knowledge of anatomy and movement kinesiology.  

Be engaging, outgoing and eager to get to know your students.  

Be ready to engage in ongoing professional continuing education and development

Effectively demonstrate or show movements taught in classes

The Compensation and Benefits

This role includes competitive hourly rate and benefits including MPF & paid annual leave. 

Subsidies in continuous education.

Complimentary studio merchandise discount.

Complimentary classes (subject to availability)

job_title: 財務策劃經理 Financial Planning Manager
description:
(Annual performance based remuneration package ranges from HK$443,124 to HK$930,560) 

THE JOB

Reporting to the Head Rowing Coach, the Rowing Coach will be responsible for the following duties:

To coach senior and junior rowers training under the Hong Kong Sports Institute’s Rowing Programme – both in Hong Kong and, when required, overseas;
To help coordinate, design, and implement training programmes for elite rowers in Hong Kong;
To fully utilize and integrate scientific, medical and other athlete support services into the elite training programme to enhance elite training outcomes;

To monitor athlete performance through comprehensive, multi-method assessment and regular evaluation, and to provide timely and critically analyzed reports as required;
To be responsible for administrative and logistical matters related to local and overseas squad training and competitions. This may include transport of athletes and equipment;
To supervise Assistant Coaches and part-time coaches;
To assist the HKSI and Hong Kong, China Rowing Association with Coach education programmes, elite talent identification and athlete recruitment; and

To perform any other appropriate duties as assigned by supervisor.

THE REQUIREMENTS

University degree or equivalent;
Holder of a valid coaching certificate issued by the relevant governing body;
A minimum of 5 years’ professional coaching experience and proven record of achievement in coaching Rowing athletes at national level or its equivalent. Coaching experience at international level would be considered an advantage;

Experience in coaching sculling and lightweight athletes would be considered an advantage;
Excellent communication in English and/ or Chinese and strong interpersonal skills;
Willing to coach from a bicycle on a daily basis;
Driving license for private car would be desirable; high level of computer literacy; and
Awareness / knowledge of Child Protection in sport and equal opportunity issues in the context of Hong Kong are an added advantage.

APPLICATIONS

Please send the completed Application Form with indication of expected salary to The Human Resources Manager, Hong Kong Sports Institute Ltd, 25 Yuen Wo Road, Sha Tin, New Territories or email: hrdept @ hksi.org.hk on or before 19 January 2022.  Please quote reference no. HKSI-20220106-RC in the application.

Appointment will be on a fixed term contract. General information is available at the website http://www.hksi.org.hk.



Applicants who are not invited for interview within six months may consider their applications unsuccessful.



All applications will be treated in the strictest confidence. Data collected will be used for recruitment and other employment-related purposes only.
